Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird
public class AngryFlappyBird extends javafx.application.Application
This class represents the Angry Flappy Bird game It extends the JavaFX Application class and implements the game logic
Author:
Team 5
